alert.note: Alert for Billings; Dunn; Hettinger; McKenzie; Slope; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 3:02AM CDT until July 10 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT/300 AM MDT/ FOR DUNN...NORTHEASTERN BILLINGS...NORTHERN HETTINGER...SOUTH CENTRAL MCKENZIE...NORTHEASTERN SLOPE AND STARK COUNTIES... At 300 AM CDT/200 AM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Grassy Butte to 4 miles northeast of Manning to 6 miles northwest of Dickinson to 4 miles west of New England, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Manning around 205 AM MDT. Dunn Center around 210 AM MDT. Killdeer around 220 AM MDT. Halliday and Taylor around 225 AM MDT. Dodge around 230 AM MDT. Marshall around 240 AM MDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hirschville, Schefield, Oakdale, Fairfield, Havelock, Lefor, New Hradec and Dickinson Regional Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Billings; Dunn; Hettinger; McKenzie; Slope; Stark
